text: (U2) uhi ho jasale um'miharuma (anapadhaharuma) tiniharumadhyebata e'uta rasula pathayo. Jasale unako samu usaka ayataharu padhera suna'umcha ra unila'i pavitra gardacha ra uniharula'i kitaba ra tatvadarsita sika'umdacha, ra nihsandeha yasabhanda pahila yi manisaharu khulla margavicalanama thi'e
